divs: sighting details2 bright lights seen between west and north west direction. one shot off quickly, the other remained for awhile. when i came back outside, the other light\ufo was gone. these were way too bright and low in the sky to be stars. friends could see them from different areas in houston, so it is doubtful that it was a spotlight or search light.
Summary: 2 bright lights, too bright, too low and too close to be stars
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around April 5th 2012
